name: Promotion Class: Frostguard
description:
Role: Ranged Defense

Using ice and heavy armor to shield themselves makes this an incredibly tough and defensive wielder of magic.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +1050
Increase Ice Storage Cap +1
Final Mitigations Cap +25%

Traits Granted:
Frostcaster Mastery
Mail Armor Proficiency
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Volatile Ice Weave: Now inflicts a Knockdown.
Freezing Blast: Now applies a Crippling Ice debuff.
Shatter Storm: Now has a chance to spawn Frost Armor on hit.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Frostguard promotion class and prevents access to the Archmage and Icecaller promotion classes.
